message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. It's worth more than $100 to me, reflecting its high quality and unique features. I am offering it to you for $120, which I believe is a fair price considering its value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned earlier.
